subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Stewart, a wing on three Stanley Cup championship teams of the Toronto Maple Leafs, was involved in an incident that led to the death of his Rangers teammate Terry Sawchuk.
snippet: Mr. Stewart, a wing on three Stanley Cup championship teams of the Toronto Maple Leafs, was involved in an incident that led to the death of his Rangers teammate Terry Sawchuk.
